title: Which will lower price of outstanding govt bonds

content.question: Which of the following will lower the prices of a country’s outstanding government bonds?

choices.label: An open-market purchase of government bonds by the country’s central bank
A decrease in the required reserve ratio for the country’s commercial banks
An outflow of financial capital to other countries
A decrease in the country’s government spending
A decrease in inflationary expectations in the country

content.answer: An outflow of financial capital to other countries

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
